short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Informs you whether a company still works in Russia.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a color mark next to the company name to show whether a company still operates in Russia.

Legend:
‚ùå - Companies that are just continuing business-as-usual in Russia.
üü† - Companies postponing future planned investment/development/marketing while continuing substantive business.
üü° - Companies that are scaling back some significant business operations but continuing some others.
‚úîÔ∏è - Companies temporarily curtailing most or nearly all operations or totally halting Russian engagements or completely exiting Russia.
